pokemonhotel

Class HotelAssistant

  • java.lang.Object
    • pokemonhotel.HotelAssistant

  • public class HotelAssistant
extends java.lang.Object
    An object of class HotelAssistant holds information on assistants that will be potentially taking care of pokemons

    • Constructor Summary

        Returns:
